attributes.action: Provide better pay for nursery nurses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that better pay is required for nursery nurses, with out us the majority of people could not go out to work. Change the laws and allow us better pay!

rejection.details:
There is a similar petition at:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Nurseynurse/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
